Package it.unibo.oop.lab.socialnetwork

Interface SocialNetworkUser<U extends User>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - specific User type
    All Superinterfaces:
    User
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocialNetworkUserImpl, Sport2SocialNetworkUserImpl, SportSocialNetworkUserImpl, SportSocialNetworkUserImpl
    public interface SocialNetworkUser<U extends User>
extends User
    Represents the user of a social network. A user follows other users and of course can be followed as well.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addFollowedUser​(java.lang.String group, U user)
      Adds a friend to the list of this user's current friends.
      java.util.List<U> getFollowedUsers()
      Gets the list of every person followed by this user disregarding the group.
      java.util.Collection<U> getFollowedUsersInGroup​(java.lang.String groupName)
      Gets the list of followed people belonging to a given group.

      • Methods inherited from interface it.unibo.oop.lab.socialnetwork.User

        getAge, getFirstName, getLastName, getUsername, isAgeDefined

    • Method Detail

      • addFollowedUser

        boolean addFollowedUser​(java.lang.String group,
                        U user)
        Adds a friend to the list of this user's current friends.
        Parameters:
        group - the group (circle) on which the user in going to be added
        user - the user to be added as a user followed
        Returns:
        true if the user to be added as a followed person does not exist yet, false otherwise

      • getFollowedUsers

        java.util.List<U> getFollowedUsers()
        Gets the list of every person followed by this user disregarding the group.
        Returns:
        the list of people followed by this user among all her groups

      • getFollowedUsersInGroup

        java.util.Collection<U> getFollowedUsersInGroup​(java.lang.String groupName)
        Gets the list of followed people belonging to a given group.
        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the group
        Returns:
        the collection of people followed by this user within group "groupName".
